attributes.action: make it illegal for government ministers, officials and agencies to criminalise the taxpayer by using taxpayer provided GB pounds to pay parking fees which should be paid by the people who illegally parked the vehicle.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is not right that the government can merely dictate that fines and other financial penalties for illegal activity can be paid for out of taxpayer pounds.  Tax is collected to run the services of the country.  It is not handed over to subsidise the illegal activities of government ministers and their drivers.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
